Querying both NAL Agricola databases (journal articles and other materials) and parsing the search results.

agricola_query.Rd

Querying both NAL Agricola databases (journal articles and other materials) and parsing the search results.

agricola_query(
  rem_dr,
  title = NULL,
  author = NULL,
  keyword = NULL,
  isbn = NULL,
  language = NULL,
  pub = NULL,
  series = NULL,
  subject = NULL,
  source = NULL,
  agricola_search_url = "https://agricola.nal.usda.gov/vwebv/search"
)

Arguments

rem_dr

remote driver
title

string
author

string
keyword

string
isbn

string
language

string
pub

string
series

string
subject

string
source

string
agricola_search_url

string optional argument

Value

dataframe of title and id links for top results (or all if fields blank).

Examples


library(RSelenium)
rem_dr <- remoteDriver(port = 4445L)
rem_dr$open(silent = TRUE)

#> Error in checkError(res): Undefined error in httr call. httr output: Failed to connect to localhost port 4445: Connection refused

agricola_query(rem_dr, title = "Biological soil crusts: Ecology and management", author = "Jayne Belnap")

#> querying with url:  https://agricola.nal.usda.gov/vwebv/search?searchArg1=biological+soil+crusts+ecology+and+management&argType1=all&searchCode1=TKEY&combine2=and&searchArg2=jayne+belnap&argType2=all&searchCode2=NKEY&combine3=and&argType3=all&recCount=10000&searchType=2&page.search.search.button=Search
#> Error in checkError(res): Undefined error in httr call. httr output: length(url) == 1 is not TRUE
